markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Centipede Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2876)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Swarms of centipedes are dangerous indeed, ravenous carpets of skittering hunger capable of devouring a traveler whole in a matter of minutes. [Kobolds](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=435) and [mitflits](/Monsters.aspx?ID=245) are both known to incorporate swarms of centipedes into cunning traps.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Centipede Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2876)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=707" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=82) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30

</row>

**Immunities**
[grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77), precision, [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88), [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=78)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 5, piercing 5, slashing 2

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) damage 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet

**Centipede Swarm Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 20 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d8 poison damage, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61), and off-guard (1 round)

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 1d8 piercing damage (DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save) plus centipede swarm venom.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-380" />
name: Centipede Swarm
